mapper.select: select * from (select rownum as rnum,a.* from (select pay_list.pay_list_idx, users.u_idx, pay_list.pay_value, pay_list.pay_type, pay_list.pay_date, pay_list.pay_point from pay_list , users where pay_list.u_idx=users.u_idx order by pay_list.pay_list_idx asc )a)b where rnum>=#{start} and rnum<=#{end}
mapper.update: update( select users.* , pay_list.pay_point from users, pay_list where users.u_idx=pay_list.u_idx and pay_list_idx= #{pay_list_idx} and pay_value != '환불' ) set u_point=u_point-pay_point
update( select pay_list.* from users, pay_list where users.u_idx=pay_list.u_idx and pay_list_idx= #{pay_list_idx} ) set pay_value='환불'
